context.name: Tippmann Arms M4 22 LR Classic Rifle
context.excerpt: The Tippmann Arms M4-22 is a premium .22 calibre semi-automatic rifle with aluminium upper and lower receivers, with all the features of a true M4.
context.content:
The Tippmann Arms M4-22 LR Classic Rifle is a premium .22 calibre semi-automatic, with aluminium upper and lower receivers, and all the features of a true M4.

The M4-22 is largely mil-spec compatible with fully functioning buffer tube.

 

 

Tippmann Arms M4 22 Classic Features:

8 Sided Handguard
4 Picatinny Rails included
Accepts AR Handguards
Standard 1/2”x28 Thread
Complete with Muzzle Break
Adjustable Flip Up Sights
Functioning Dust Cover
Front & Rear Sling Mounts
Forward Assist
Easy load magazines
Easy to customise
Upgradeable trigger group set at 4.5lbs standard
Selector Switch Safety
All Aluminium Receivers
Charging Handle
Bolt hold open on empty magazine
Capacity – 20 Rounds
Take Down – Push Pin
